prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek body and vibrant colors that stand out.
Show me a Pokemon that has a humanoid shape and features a unique mix of orange and blue.
Imagine a legendary creature with long, flowing tentacle-like appendages and a cosmic appearance.
Generate a Pokemon with a striking orange and blue color palette, perfect for battles.
Design a mythical Pokemon that embodies speed and agility, with a distinctive alien look.
Give me a Pokemon that represents the evolution of psychic powers, with a futuristic vibe.
Make a creature that looks both powerful and mysterious, featuring a blend of colors and shapes.
